18:1962 3300.F Interstate Commerce (1)

charges.charge_disposition: The Defendant is Hereby Committed to The Custody of The United States Bureau of Prisons to be Imprisoned For A Total Term of Thirty-Seven (37) Months on Count 1 of The Indictment. The Defendant is Remanded to The Custody of The United States Marshal. Upon Release From Imprisonment, The Defendant Shall be on Supervised Release For A Term of Two (2) Years on Count 1 of The Indictment. The Court Waives Fine And Costs of Incarceration. The Defendant Shall Make Total Restitution in The Amount of $114,550.00. Schedule of Payments.

18:1962 3300.F Interstate Commerce (1)

charges.charge_disposition: The Defendant is Hereby Committed to The Custody of The United States Bureau of Prisons to be Imprisoned For A Total Term of Fifteen (15) Months on Count 1 of The Indictment. The Defendant is Remanded to The Custody of The United States Marshal. Upon Release From Imprisonment, The Defendant Shall be on Supervised Release For A Term of Three (3) Years on Count 1 of The Indictment. The Defendant Shall Make Total Restitution in The Amount of $102,723.00. Schedule of Payments.
